Explanation:
The original post attributes the feeling of suicide to an internal factor, "a dark cloud that follows me everywhere," which is seen as a part of the person's identity. In contrast, the transferred post attributes the feeling of suicide to external factors by using phrases such as "unpredictable nature of life" and "external social dynamics." The transferred post also removes any reference to internal attributions, such as personal shortcomings or character traits, and instead emphasizes the impact of external factors on one's well-being.
